eventSummary:
Kraken is experiencing internal risk control triggers and compliance-related withdrawal rejections due to unusual account activity patterns. Multiple users report difficulties connecting to Kraken's mobile apps and pending withdrawals for over two days, indicating potential operational disruptions possibly linked to a cyberattack.
Sources:
- https://t.me/kraken_exchange_official
- https://status.kraken.com/incidents/mvxcxggzr92k
- https://www.reddit.com/r/CoinBase/comments/1lh3j5c/coinbase_withholding_access_to_funds/
